intro: Schistostephium rotundifolium, commonly known as the round-leafed schistostephium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features rounded, lobed leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It produces small, daisy-like yellow flowers that bloom in spring. Schistostephium rotundifolium is typically found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
